name: Alaska State
bio: Acquired hat during vacation to Alaska. Bought in tourist shop in Skagway.
details: Green hat with brown felt brim. Has state name, along with a brown bear in the middle of the leather patch. At the bottom, it says 'The Last Frontier', Alaska's state motto.

name: California State
bio: Parents acquired hat when visiting San Francisco during vacation.
details: Black and gray hat. Big cursive 'Cali' on front with small ones in a checkered pattern on underside of brim. Small brown bear walking, representing California's State Flag.

name: Colorado State
bio: Bought during Layover in Denver on the way to Alaska.
details: Trucker-Style hat. Front has the colors of Colorado's state flag with the mountains at the bottom.

name: Back To The Future
bio: Hat from the Movie 'Back to the Future: Part II'. Bought during vacation to Universal Studios in Orlando, Florida.
details: Reflective rainbow colors all around hat.

name: Hawaii State
bio: Bought by Parents during vacation to Hawaii. found in Hana.
details: Red base, 'Hana', the city's name, written in cursive on the front, with the Hawaiian flag on the top of the brim.

name: Chicago Windy City
bio: Bought during a school field trip to Chicago, found at a pier shop. My second hat in my collection.
details: Beige base with black brim and accents. Leather patch that says, 'Chicago The Windy City', with the city flag behind it.

name: Lake Michigan Sunrise
bio: Bought during Vacation to Michigan. Found in a Harbor town gift shop.
details: Black base with baby blue script saying, 'Michigan'. The Brim is a sunset over Lake Michigan.

name: New York Designer
bio: Bought at the H&M in Times Square during a vacation to New York City. My first hat the begin my collection
details: Dark gray and light gray hat. Felt Brim, with patch that says 'YHH'.

name: Coach Designer
bio: Bought at Coach Outlet Store. On sale for half off. My most expensive hat in my collection.
details: Leather brim and clasp. Coach design on hat with cursive 'Coach' in blue.

name: Texas State
bio: Bought in Dallas Airport during layover to Cincinnati from Seattle.
details: Trucker-Style. Texas state outline on front with 'Tx' in the middle. Looks older than it really is.
